about_the_game:
Numbers of Everything is literally about [Everything] in our daily life. Clock, coin, and many others, they are all very familiar in our daily life. We have stopped observing and thinking about them. The game borrows these “small” and daily objects as starting points to discuss “big” and abstract questions, like time, past, and emotions.


Numbers of Everything is a puzzle game in the format of numeric manipulations. Math is hard, but don't panic! The game features many many entry levels that are very friendly to beginners until you feel ready to step up. It also equips the player with modern technology that enabling retry, rewind.


There are hidden gems inside the game across everywhere. Awaiting to be found and collected.


This is my second personal game. I feel thankful and connected to everyone who has played it. There is a lot to be communicated but allow me sometime to organize my feelings.
detailed_description:
Join Community


Number of Everything features constant and countless updates about [Everything]. Please consider joining the community for the latest updates and discussing with players and developers.
Discord:
The second theme can be discovered in the Demo by typing in [SECRET CODE] found in the community.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600

name: Numbers of Everything

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX9 compatible with at least 500MB of memory
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Numbers of Everything interprets common objects/concepts in everyday life from unique perspectives. These perspectives are then mashed into puzzles based on numerical manipulations. Let’s talk about cats, work, time, and everything by playing puzzles.
